description:
Phoenix is left to mind the house alone with Koala; what can go wrong? Then, Phoenix eats a few too many of Alyssa`s desserts. Meanwhile, Fennel and Glind get dating tips from an expert.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Home Alone Circumstances of the Familiars / The Weight Loss Circumstances of the Corpulent Phoenix / The Romantic Advice Circumstances of the Men Without Dates
Tsukaima-tachi no Orusuban Jijou / Hidai na Fushichou no Genryou Jijou / Motezaru Otoko-tachi no Ren`ai Soudan Jijou
使い魔たちのお留守番事情 / 肥大な不死鳥の減量事情 / モテざる男たちの恋愛相談事情
